content:
It sounds like you have a $20 off $100 purchase voucher for Bed Bath & Beyond that's expiring soon.

To make the most of your voucher, consider the following:

1. **Plan your purchase:** Think about what you need or want to buy from Bed Bath & Beyond. Make a list of items that total at least $100 to maximize the value of your voucher.
2. **Check prices:** Verify the prices of the items you want to ensure they add up to at least $100. You can check prices online or in-store.
3. **Use it before it expires:** Make sure to use your voucher before it expires. You don't want to miss out on the opportunity to save $20!
4. **Combine with other offers:** If you have any other coupons, promo codes, or sales, try to combine them with your voucher to increase your savings.

Remember to read the voucher's terms and conditions to ensure you understand any restrictions or limitations. If you have any questions, you can always contact Bed Bath & Beyond's customer service or visit a store for assistance.

Good luck, and happy shopping!
